resources.string: Hey, welcome to my world, I am an enthusiastic student living in Ireland since 2018, and this app is part of many of others skills I have learned during my journey at Dorset College in Dublin. This is my first mobile application, hope you enjoy my work!
Bachelor of International Business UCS - Universidade de Caxias do Sul Bachelor of Science in Computing - Dorset College - Dublin, since 2020
Critical thinking, Communication, Creativity, Flexibility,Teamwork, Professional Ethics, Responsibility

The first of my family to leave Brazil, doing my second degree in Europe. When you live far away from your home town, anything you conquer looks a big achievement, you have to get a job to pay for your studies, a place for live with dignity, manage time to socialize and increase your network of friends.
